snippet: Reporters who cover Mr. de Blasio for The New York Times recently appraised his first year in office, identifying areas of strength and concern. Readers were asked to do the same, if a bit more bluntly: About 1,900 replies arrived with letter grades...
abstract: New Yorkers offer their own appraisals of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's first year in office.
lead_paragraph: Reporters who cover Mr. de Blasio for The New York Times recently appraised his first year in office, identifying areas of strength and concern. Readers were asked to do the same, if a bit more bluntly: About 1,900 replies arrived with letter grades for the mayor.

headline.print_headline: Grading de Blasio: The Readers Speak
headline.main: Grading Mayor Bill de Blasio: The Readers Speak
